comment.author: 7279101@N06
comment._content: Date 11/12/13 scratched on the back of the negative. HMS Berwick, launched 1902, broken up for scrap 1920. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HMS_Berwick_(1902)

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Black and white archive: Thanks for pointing out the date here.  We'll include it next time we update the record.
